pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:6.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:6.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:6.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:6.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:7.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:8.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:10.1: Anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:10.2: Anāpucchite vematikā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:10.3: Anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
